products.manufacturer: Isuzu Technical Center of America, Inc.

summary: WHEN THE VEHICLE WAS STARTED, THE GAS GAUGE WOULD GO PASS EMPTY AND CAUSED THE ENGINE LIGHT TO APPEAR, WHEN GOING OVER BUMPS THE VEHICLE WOULD SWING OUT (ALMOST LOST CONTROL), WHEN THE SPEED GOES UP TO 60 MPH THE FRONT END VIBRATES, AND WHEN A RIGHT TURN WAS MADE, A CRACKING NOISE WAS HEARD.  THE DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATE.  *MR  SCC
